attributes.action: To lift the ban on nick greger,and allow him into the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the prime minister to lift the ban on nick greger and give him the freedom to visit the U.K.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
